languages.text: "Вы посягаете на сокровища моей души, мои маленькие секреты. Как иначе я могу уберечь их от столь могущественно{mf|го|й} грабител{mf|я|ьницы}, как Вольный Торговец? Не посмею же я вам отказать!" {n}Ослепительно улыбаясь вам, Джай воркует голоском трепещущей монашки, в котором лишь изредка прорезаются смешливые нотки.{/n}

"You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы посягаете на сокровища моей души, мои маленькие секреты. Как иначе я могу уберечь их от столь могущественно{mf|го|й} грабител{mf|я|ьницы}, как Вольный Торговец? Не посмею же я вам отказать!" {n}Ослепительно улыбаясь вам, Джай воркует голоском трепещущей монашки, в котором лишь изредка прорезаются смешливые нотки.{/n}

I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Está intentando profundizar en los tesoros de mi alma, en mis pequeños secretos. ¿Cómo si no puedo protegerlos de un{mf||a} ladr{mf|ón|ona} tan poderos{mf|o|a} como un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente? ¡No me atrevo a negarme!». {n}Jae te dedica una sonrisa deslumbrante y titubea con la vergüenza de una monja, dejando entrever su sincera diversión solo por un momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Está intentando profundizar en los tesoros de mi alma, en mis pequeños secretos. ¿Cómo si no puedo protegerlos de un{mf||a} ladr{mf|ón|ona} tan poderos{mf|o|a} como un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente? ¡No me atrevo a negarme!». {n}Jae te dedica una sonrisa deslumbrante y titubea con la vergüenza de una monja, dejando entrever su sincera diversión solo por un momento.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你在窥探我灵魂的宝藏，我心中的小秘密。如果我不这么做，在行商浪人这么凶狠的强盗面前，我还能怎么保护它们的安全呢？毕竟我可不敢拒绝你！”{n}婕伊对你绽放出耀眼的微笑，以妩媚、矜持的姿态拒绝了你。只有在极少数情况下，她才会流露出一丝这样真正的喜悦。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你在窥探我灵魂的宝藏，我心中的小秘密。如果我不这么做，在行商浪人这么凶狠的强盗面前，我还能怎么保护它们的安全呢？毕竟我可不敢拒绝你！”{n}婕伊对你绽放出耀眼的微笑，以妩媚、矜持的姿态拒绝了你。只有在极少数情况下，她才会流露出一丝这样真正的喜悦。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたはあたしの魂を、ささやかな秘密を覗きこもうとしてるのよ。自由開拓者みたいな強力な泥棒からそれを守るのに、他にどんな方法があるっていうの？あたしにはあんたを拒絶する勇気なんてないわ！」{n}まばゆいばかりの笑顔をあなたに向けつつも、ジェイはソワソワと修道女のようにまごつきながら異議を唱える。彼女の嘘のないユーモアが顔をのぞかせるのは珍しいことだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あんたはあたしの魂を、ささやかな秘密を覗きこもうとしてるのよ。自由開拓者みたいな強力な泥棒からそれを守るのに、他にどんな方法があるっていうの？あたしにはあんたを拒絶する勇気なんてないわ！」{n}まばゆいばかりの笑顔をあなたに向けつつも、ジェイはソワソワと修道女のようにまごつきながら異議を唱える。彼女の嘘のないユーモアが顔をのぞかせるのは珍しいことだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous cherchez à percer à jour les trésors de mon âme, mon jardin secret jalousement gardé. Que puis-je faire d'autre pour me préserver d'{mf|un voleur|une voleuse} aussi habile que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ? Jamais je n'oserais vous éconduire de but en blanc ! » {n}Tout en vous gratifiant d'un sourire éblouissant, Jae se défend en affectant un embarras de vierge effarouchée, ne laissant transparaître que de rares indices de son amusement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous cherchez à percer à jour les trésors de mon âme, mon jardin secret jalousement gardé. Que puis-je faire d'autre pour me préserver d'{mf|un voleur|une voleuse} aussi habile que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ? Jamais je n'oserais vous éconduire de but en blanc ! » {n}Tout en vous gratifiant d'un sourire éblouissant, Jae se défend en affectant un embarras de vierge effarouchée, ne laissant transparaître que de rares indices de son amusement.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr bohrt in den Schätzen meiner Seele, meinen kleinen Geheimnissen. Wie sonst kann ich sie von einem solch mächtigen Räuber wie dem Freihändler beschützen? Ich wage es nicht, mich Euch zu widersetzen!" {n}Jae schenkt dir ein strahlendes Lächeln und lässt mit nonnengleicher Verlegenheit die Lider flattern. Nur selten brechen kleine Anzeichen ihrer tatsächlichen Belustigung durch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr bohrt in den Schätzen meiner Seele, meinen kleinen Geheimnissen. Wie sonst kann ich sie von einem solch mächtigen Räuber wie dem Freihändler beschützen? Ich wage es nicht, mich Euch zu widersetzen!" {n}Jae schenkt dir ein strahlendes Lächeln und lässt mit nonnengleicher Verlegenheit die Lider flattern. Nur selten brechen kleine Anzeichen ihrer tatsächlichen Belustigung durch.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}

languages.text: "Ruhumun hazinelerine, içimdeki küçük sırlara müdahil oluyorsun. Onları Hür Tacir gibi kudretli bir hırsızdan başka nasıl koruyabilirim ki? Sana karşı gelmeye cüret edemem!" {n}Sana baş döndürücü bir gülüş atan Jae, ileri geri sallanıyor ve itiraz ederken naif, utangaç bir mizaca bürünüyor. Samimi bir şekilde eğlendiğini ilk kez bu kadar belli ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are prying at the treasures of my soul, my little secrets. How else can I keep them safe from such a powerful robber as the Rogue Trader? I dare not refuse you!" {n}Bestowing a dazzling smile upon you, Jae demurs with fluttering, nunnish abashment, with hints of her genuine amusement breaking through only rarely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ruhumun hazinelerine, içimdeki küçük sırlara müdahil oluyorsun. Onları Hür Tacir gibi kudretli bir hırsızdan başka nasıl koruyabilirim ki? Sana karşı gelmeye cüret edemem!" {n}Sana baş döndürücü bir gülüş atan Jae ileri geri sallanıyor ve itiraz ederken naif ve utangaç bir mizaca bürünüyor. Samimi bir şekilde eğlendiğini bu kadar belli etmesine daha önce pek sık rastlamamıştın.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
